name: Pokemaku ~the warmest winter~ Pokemon danmaku
description:
Pokemon + Touhou = oh no.. Story

if was winter but suddenly the weather became warm! so.. yeah let's go mew!

Game Play

if you press shoot button(Z) twice fast. shoots pokeball when pokeball hits pokemon you will get its skill (check the bottom-left!) C key to shoot D key to change skill slot (pokeball can not get skill from boss! )

  • Z : Shoot, get exp item to power up, press twice to shoot pokeball
  • X: Bomb, when you are in danger press it
  • C: Use Skill, use pokeball to get skill
  • D: Change skill slot, max 3 (Bomb includes, so not max 4)
  • Shift: Hold to move slow
  • Arrow keys: Move
other system
  • Green Gauge: Your Health
  • Pokeball Gauge: transparent cyan gauge, you can shoot pokeball when it's full
  • Skill Gauge: cyan gauge in bottom-left skill slot, get 1 pp when full
  • Graze: Get score, pokeball gauge, and skill gauge

Unfortunately this game language is developed in Korean, so skill name, character text is yet Korean.
